CacheStorageOpen.summary:
The open() method of the
interface returns a {{jsxref("Promise")}} that resolves to
the object matching the cacheName.

remarks.para:
You can access CacheStorage through the global
property.

blockquote.para:
Note: If the specified does not exist, a new
cache is created with that cacheName and a that
resolves to this new object is returned.

CacheStorageOpen.returns: A {{jsxref("Promise")}} that resolves to the requested object.
